title: Riot Ward via Hextech Loot Crafting?
body:
Is it possible to obtain the Riot Fist ward via Hextech Loot? As someone who aspires to, one day, be a Rioter herself - I'd like to fuel my ~~completely healthy ~~obsession and showcase my love for Riot in game.

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

replies.body: Oooooo I'm pretty sure that one can *only* be given out through the ward cards that some Rioters carry with them.
